transcript:
Customer: Theek hai sir, phone rakh do aap. 
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji, kahan se baat kar rahe hain sir aap?
Customer: Madam, kaise bol raha hu mai toh.
Executive: Sir ka phone aa raha hai fir se, baat karwa do ek baar.
Customer: Haan ji sir. 
Executive: Sir bola hua hai maine unko already call.
Customer: Maine bola hua hai unko already aapko call back karne ke liye.
Executive: Phone uthayenge nahi woh toh nahi uthayenge phone.
Customer: Kya?
Customer: Are phone nahi uthayenge woh toh. Woh kyu uthayenge phone?
Executive: Sir maine unko already saamne se bol diya hai aapko call karne ke liye.
Customer: Toh senior ka number do aap kisi ko aur ka.
Executive: Toh maine unko directly bol toh diya hai call back karne ke liye aapko, jaise hi woh free hote hain woh kar lenge aapko call. 
Customer: Senior ho gaye woh toh hamare ko bhi clear hai mai aapko kisi aur se baat karwa sakti hu.
Customer: Aap kisi aur ka number do.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji sir.
Customer: Madam kisi aur ka number do aap.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Mai keh raha hu kisi aur ka number do aap.
Executive: Sir kisi aur se kis se aap baat karenge? Aapka catalog mere paas hai na sir. Account manager aapki mai hu.
Customer: Kisi ko kisko kya pata hai sir aapke catalog ke baare mein? Mai jaanti hu na.
Customer: Haan toh aap jaante ho toh woh cancel kyu lagao na usme application aap jaante ho toh.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Usme cancel kyu lagao na application.
Executive: Sir Manoj sir ko already yeh cheez batai hui hai, jaise hi woh meeting mein hai abhi, jaise hi woh free hote hain woh karenge aapko call.
Customer: Free hai woh toh, sab free ho aap.
Executive: Nahi hai sir.
Executive: Senior manager hai woh, meeting mein hai abhi. Karwa deti hu mai aapki baat.
Customer: Aadhe ghante mein call karta hu wapis. 
Executive: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to talk to a senior executive.

- Customer wants to cancel the application.



Resolution:

- Executive stated Manoj Sir is in meeting.

- Executive said Manoj Sir will call back.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back in half an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call back, cancel application, senior executive
